content: even though i named the pattern just zigzag it s much more than that it s also triangles mountains and even christmas trees very easy & fast inset mosaic crochet pattern where you work two row in each color so you do not have to cut the yarn no tails no fringe the pattern allows you to create nearly anything you want blanket afghan scarf bag cushion cover… the pattern includes 1 repeated section that you can work as many times as you want so your creation can be as wide and as long as you wish it s recommended to use two or more contrasting same weight yarn colors the chart is created using 2 colors **experience level ** confident beginner **language & terminology ** english us **technique ** inset mosaic crochet **the pattern includes ** introductory information about
